reviewText: Toby Drew hosts this 30 minute video.  It has counselors working with several patients.  The patients share their individual symptoms.  There is discussion about the different forms of bipolar illness, the causes, the treatment, medications, and relapses.  I understand better what Mixed Bipolar (having the manic and depressive sides at the same time) means and how it presents to other people as chronic irritability or moodiness.  Although a short video, there is something to be gained by viewing this video.
